thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com | 3 of 95
thread.title: Shabbir

author: Shabbir
title: Shabbir
text: I ordered a t-shirt for my little bro week ago, paid for the delivery and I still haven't received it. I called them yesterday to find out what happened and they still haven't dispatched the item. He was sooo excited and it is sad to see him asking every day "where is my tshirt" poor thing. I'm getting so frustrated with their service and not even picking up the phone for inquiries. I'll never ever use their service again
